roleset.name: travel leisurely in (or as) an automobile
roleset.note: TOOL-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search and wordnet. Member of Vncls drive-11.5. Comparison to 'move'. Roleset by Julia. (from tool.01-v)

example.name: inanimate Arg1
example.text: The silver gypsy cab tooled past once more.

example.name: I pity the fool who tools around in a large van
example.src: I pity the fool who tools around in a large van
example.type: I pity the fool who tools around in a large van
example.text: On the lam from the law, they tooled around in a big black 1983 GMC Vandura piloted by Mr.T.
example.arg: On the lamb from the law
in a big black 1983 GMC Vandura piloted by Mr. T.

example.name: all arguments
example.text: He tooled the car along the treacherous path.

roleset.name: furnish a location with tools
roleset.note: TOOL-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search and wordnet. Vncls fill-9.8. Comparison to 'stock'. Roleset by Julia (from tool.02-v)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Our machinist has tooled the shop with jigs and fixtures that allow modifications.
example.arg: with jigs and fixtures that allow modifications.

example.name: with purpose, without explicit tools
example.text: They tooled the shop to be ready for production as soon as the proto is done.
example.arg: to be ready for production as soon as the proto is done.

roleset.name: work material with a tool
roleset.note: TOOL-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search and wordnet. Vncls image_impression-25.1, carve-21.2-2. Comparison to 'etch'. Roleset by Julia. (from tool.03-v)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: I hand tooled the leather with an arrow angled basket-weave pattern.
example.arg: with an arrow angled basket-weave pattern.

example.name: passive with end product
example.text: [The leather]-1 was intricately tooled *trace*-1 into a lacelike design as a border.

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: I-1 had sewed it, backed it, bound and *trace*-1 tooled it.

roleset.name: make better by equipping with "tools"
roleset.note: TOOL_UP-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. No Vncls. Roleset by Julia (from tool.04-v)

example.name: both args- semi-metaphorical usage
example.text: Wasserburg?s whole laboratory got enormously better in terms of precision and everything else and the factthat they would do much smaller samples and so forth, because of [the way]-1 he tooled up the lunarprogram *trace*-1 .
